thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai DZH receives judgment regarding securities misrepresention liability disputes lawsuits

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai DZH receives judgment regarding securities misrepresention liability disputes lawsuits
text:
March 5(Reuters) - Shanghai DZH Ltd
* Says 22 individuals filed a lawsuit against the co and 14 individuals filed a lawsuit against the co and an accounting firm (BDO), regarding securities misrepresention liability disputes
* Says co received judgment for the lawsuits and co was ordered to pay 6.1 million yuan and related interest to 36 individuals
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/H57VqU
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
